translation.Tenho 19 anos e procuro meu primeiro emp: I'm 19 years old and looking for my first job in Front-End programming. Although my experience has been mostly academic, I am very excited to apply my knowledge and skills in a real work environment.
translation.Estou no quinto período da faculdade, cu: I am in the fifth period of college, studying a degree in informatics at IFPI - Instituto Federal do Piauí, with an end date scheduled for 10/2024.
